source:
TEXT_LUCKZE016_03450_SEQ_00 Quest Sync
Ersabel looks at you expectantly, which can mean only one thing.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE016_03450_SEQ_00特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト
スリザーバウのエルサベルは、冒険者に急ぎの頼みがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZE016_03450_TODO_00<tab>Use the sickly sweet nectar at the designated location and slay the snapmint for its leaves.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE016_03450_TODO_00にを使い、
現れたを討伐

source: TEXT_LUCKZE016_03450_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the snapmint leaves to Ersabel.

TEXT_LUCKZE016_03450_ERSABEL_000_001<tab>Pardon me, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>, but could I trouble you to help me with preparations for <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((mealtime)) ((supper)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((supper)) ((mealtime)) /var>)) /var>?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE016_03450_ERSABEL_000_001炊事の時間が近いんだけれど、少し手を借りられないかい？
今日の献立の風味付けに欠かせないものを、
すっかり切らしていることに気が付いてね。

source: TEXT_LUCKZE016_03450_ERSABEL_000_002<tab>Thank you. I have need of a rather peculiar herb, but I fear I am ill-suited to gathering it myself.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE016_03450_ERSABEL_000_002ありがとう、助かるよ！
あたしが出向いて奮闘するより、
手練のあんたに頼むほうが、ずっと早いだろうからね。

source: TEXT_LUCKZE016_03450_ERSABEL_000_003<tab>It grows on snapmint, you see. Their camouflage makes them difficult to find, and even if I should, I would likely be devoured before I could pluck even a single leaf from their hides.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE016_03450_ERSABEL_000_003の胴体に生えている、
「」が2枚必要なんだけれど、
擬態が上手くて、なかなか見つけ出せなくてね。

source: TEXT_LUCKZE016_03450_ERSABEL_000_004<tab>Take this nectar and sprinkle it about the fields to the north. When they come out of hiding, that will be your chance to strike.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE016_03450_ERSABEL_000_004北の朽ちた木のあたりで、この「」を撒いておくれ。
同族に縄張りを荒らされたと勘違いして、
茂みから飛び出してくるはずさ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZE016_03450_ERSABEL_000_005<tab>Once they catch the scent of the nectar, they will be compelled to show themselves. That will be your chance to strike.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE016_03450_ERSABEL_000_005まず、北の朽ちた木のあたりで「」を撒くんだよ。
そうして現れた魔物を倒して、「」を2枚、
集めてきてほしいのさ、頼んだよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZE016_03450_ERSABEL_000_020<tab>Were you able to find any snapmint?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE016_03450_ERSABEL_000_020やぁ、手間をかけたねぇ。
「」は手に入れられたかい？

source: TEXT_LUCKZE016_03450_ERSABEL_000_021<tab>Goodness, these leaves are so large. Thank you.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE016_03450_ERSABEL_000_021おやまあ、立派な大きさだね！
ありがとう、早速使わせてもらうよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZE016_03450_ERSABEL_000_022<tab>I could never hope to cook my prahok without this.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE016_03450_ERSABEL_000_022これは、スリザーバウで造られる発酵食品、
プラホックの調理に欠かせない品なのさ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZE016_03450_ERSABEL_000_023<tab>Are you familiar with this dish? After leaving our fish to dry, it is salted then fermented. Once ready, you then mix it with a grilled meat of your choice, and wrap it in leaves of snapmint.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE016_03450_ERSABEL_000_023すりつぶした魚を発酵させたものでね、
それを肉なんかと混ぜて、この葉に包み込んで焼き上げるんだ。
素朴な味ながら、これが美味しいんだよ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZE016_03450_ERSABEL_000_024<tab>It keeps quite well, so we eat it often. Though the recipe is simple, you can add all manner of herbs and spices to suit your tastes.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE016_03450_ERSABEL_000_024プラホックは保存食だから、食べる機会が多い分、
みんなが飽きないように、いろいろ工夫したくてねぇ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZE016_03450_ERSABEL_000_025<tab>Should you have the opportunity, I insist you try it for yourself.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE016_03450_ERSABEL_000_025取りに行ってもらえて助かったよ。
機会があれば、あんたもスリザーバウの味を試してみておくれ。
